mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAD_AREA ( AREA_ID, MODEL_ID, AREA_NM, AREA_DESC, AREA_COLOR, AREA_SIZE, AREA_STYLE, REG_DDTM, REG_ID ) VALUES ( 'AR' || LPAD( NVL( (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AREA_ID, 3))) FROM CAD_AREA), 0 ) + 1, 4, '0' ), #{modelId}, #{areaNm}, #{areaDesc}, #{areaColor}, #{areaSize}, #{areaStyle}, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM' )

INSERT INTO CAD_AREA_COORD ( COORD_ID, AREA_ID, POINT_ORDER, X_COORD, Y_COORD, REG_DDTM, REG_ID ) VALUES ( 'CO' || LPAD( NVL( (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(COORD_ID, 3))) FROM CAD_AREA_COORD), 0 ) + 1, 6, '0' ), #{areaId}, #{pointOrder}, #{x}, #{y}, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM' )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(AREA_ID) FROM CAD_AREA WHERE AREA_ID LIKE 'AR%'

SELECT AREA_ID as areaId, MODEL_ID as modelId, AREA_NM as areaNm, AREA_SIZE as areaSize, AREA_DESC as areaDesc, AREA_COLOR as areaColor, AREA_STYLE as areaStyle, REG_DDTM as regDdtm, REG_ID as regId, LST_ADJ_DDTM as lstAdjDdtm, LST_ADJ_ID as lstAdjId FROM CAD_AREA WHERE MODEL_ID = #{modelId} ORDER BY REG_DDTM DESC

SELECT COORD_ID as coordId, AREA_ID as areaId, POINT_ORDER as pointOrder, X_COORD as x, Y_COORD as y, REG_DDTM as regDdtm, REG_ID as regId, LST_ADJ_DDTM as lstAdjDdtm, LST_ADJ_ID as lstAdjId FROM CAD_AREA_COORD WHERE AREA_ID = #{areaId} ORDER BY POINT_ORDER ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CAD_AREA SET AREA_NM = #{areaNm}, AREA_DESC = #{areaDesc}, AREA_COLOR = #{areaColor}, AREA_STYLE = #{areaStyle}, LST_ADJ_DDTM = SYSDATE, LST_ADJ_ID = 'SYSTEM' WHERE AREA_ID = #{areaId}
